title: India among top three in AI readiness, but workforce fluency is key: Experts
description: With Indian CEOs accelerating investments in artificial intelligence, experts say the country’s ability to translate boardroom intent into workforce-wide AI capability will determine whether it can convert its global readiness ranking into long-term economic leadership.
content: With Indian CEOs accelerating investments in artificial intelligence, experts say the country’s ability to translate boardroom intent into workforce-wide AI capability will determine whether it can convert its global readiness ranking into long-term ... [5136 chars]

title: AI disruption could hit credit markets next, UBS analyst says
description: UBS analyst Matthew Mish told CNBC that the artificial intelligence transformation is happening faster than he and his colleagues had previously anticipated.
content: The stock market has been quick to punish software firms and other perceived losers from the artificial intelligence boom in recent weeks, but credit markets are likely to be the next place where AI disruption risk shows up, according to UBS analyst ... [3512 chars]

title: AI Fears Weigh on Call Center Operator’s $600 Million Bond Sale
description: Concentrix Corp., a US firm that provides outsourced customer service and call-center operations for other companies, paid a hefty price this week to refinance debt amid fears that artificial intelligence will undermine its business.
content:
Concentrix Corp., a US firm that provides outsourced customer service and call-center operations for other companies, paid a hefty price this week to refinance debt amid fears that artificial intelligence will undermine its business.

title: AI is indeed coming - but there is also evidence to allay investor fears
description: Opinions are divided about the potential impact of artificial intelligence as the response to a recent viral essay shows
content:
The message from investors to the software, wealth management, legal services and logistics industries this month has been clear: AI is coming for your business.
The release of new, ever more powerful AI tools has coincided with a stock market slide,... [5956 chars]

title: Nvidia shares go cold even as Big Tech spending on AI balloons
description: Big Tech keeps raising its spending plans for artificial intelligence infrastructure, yet shares of Nvidia Corp., one of the biggest beneficiaries of that flood of cash, have been largely stagnant for months.
content:

title: AI toy maker exposed thousands of replies to kids, senators say
description: A company that makes toys powered by artificial intelligence exposed snippets of thousands of conversations its toys had with children.
content:
A company that makes toys powered by artificial intelligence exposed snippets of thousands of conversations its toys had with children, according to Sens. Marsha Blackburn, R-Tenn., and Richard Blumenthal, D-Conn.

title: Anthropic raises $30B, valuing OpenAI rival at $380B
description: SAN FRANCISCO, California — Artificial intelligence (AI) company Anthropic said Thursday it raised $30 billion in its latest funding round that values the OpenAI rival at $380 billion, underscoring the breakneck pace of AI investments.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO, California — Artificial intelligence (AI) company Anthropic said Thursday it raised $30 billion in its latest funding round that values the OpenAI rival at $380 billion, underscoring the breakneck pace of AI investments.

title: Goldman Traders Launch AI-Proof Software Basket Amid Sector Rout
description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has rolled out a new custom basket aimed at navigating the growing upheaval in software stocks, betting on companies perceived to be better insulated from artificial intelligence disruption than others.
